name: Furiod
description:
This game is a tribute to the Arkanoid arcade game and to the 8-bit music composers of the 80s... 

It includes more than 100 levels with 100 exceptional music from Commodore 64 and for the best, a boss awaits you at the end of the game ;-) A retro game in 3D very fun and accessible to all. 

Reminder of some rules and options: : (also listed in the main menu)

 Full color options are considered Bonuses! 
the reverse color options like Malus. 

Options :

Press 'F' key to switch windowed / fullscreen.
Press 'P' key to pause / resume game.

Special options: 

- white pill: 1 additional life. 
- black pill: death.
 - red pill: missiles. 
- brown pill: multi beads. 
- violet pill: exit of the level. 

Special behaviours: 

Unbreakable or transparent bricks can significantly alter the trajectory and speed of the ball! 

Blocked balls generate options - just be patient. 

Bricks destroyed by missiles or explosions do not generate options. 

An additional life is gained by reaching the following scores: -10000 -30000 -70000 -15000 -30000 -60000
